cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 115 mi SSE of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the southeast Louisiana coast, then expected to turn west and drift just offshore or along the Louisiana coastline toward the upper TX coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just east of Morgan City, Louisiana

weather_observation.watch_coast: No coastal watches in effect west of Intracoastal City, LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Intracoastal City, LA eastward to the Mississippi/Alabama border (includes Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas, and Metropolitan New Orleans)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Louisiana and Mississippi Gulf Coast; lesser effects possible into upper Texas coast
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty winds possible; chance (≤14%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds Tuesday night into Wednesday
weather_observation.storm_surge: None anticipated above minor 1–2 ft levels along the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible in outer bands late Tuesday through Wednesday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along Upper Texas beaches
